welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newfane, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful place has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid boarding pass.
